title: Protect yourself online with OysterVPN, now only $39.99 for a lifetime of coverage
content:
Macworld

Over the past 20 years, hackers and other online troublemakers have breached more than 16 million accounts worldwide. So it’s no wonder that right now, one of every three internet users and nearly 95% of all organizations use a virtual private network (VPN) as a primary line of defense in protecting all their sensitive information online.

Add yourself to the growing ranks of those protecting their own online systems and data with a lifetime subscription to OysterVPN, now available at a best-on-the-web one-time price of just $39.99.

With OysterVPN, you’ll be part of a growing base of more than 180 servers located in over 22 countries around the globe, including the US, UK, Canada, Australia, Hong Kong, and Japan. When you’re connected, all your data is fully protected using powerful 256-bit military-grade encryption, making you invisible to cyberthieves, online snoops, and internet service providers alike, all trying to peek into your activities or vital information.

With one OysterVPN subscription covering up to 5 devices simultaneously, you can enjoy free and easy access like unrestricted streaming around the world. Plus, you’ve got access to a cybersecurity toolbox that covers all your bases, including handy features like DNS leak protection, a NAT firewall, ad blocking, ISP throttling protection, and more.

Outlets like MakeUseOf praise OysterVPN, saying, “You won’t pay a fortune for an OysterVPN subscription, but you can be assured that your connection will remain fast enough to be useful for streaming, gaming, and downloading,” 

Regularly priced at $199.97, this limited-time deal slashes that cost all the way down to just $39.99, or less than $4 a month for the first year alone.
